title: Integrated Elementary Science-English Learning Design Utilizing Web 2.0 Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Learning science curricula in English while enhancing interaction through Web 2.0 tools

learning_goals: Learners can use blogging tools to record and share science experiment processes in English.
Learners can improve draft science reports through peer evaluation and feedback on a collaborative wiki platform.
Learners can use podcast creation tools to record and present science concept explanations in English.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
